price: And those who do not witness falsehood[39], and when they pass by futility, they pass by with dignity;
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا
footnotes: [39] i.e., places of sin, evil, and indecency.
